dialogues.text: A younger version of Ash rocks on the floor—glitching, replaying an emotional breakdown loop. They whisper to someone who isn’t there.

dialogues.speaker: YOUNG ASH
dialogues.text: "If it loves you, it won’t let you leave. If it loves you, it keeps you safe. If it loves you, you don’t think alone again."

dialogues.speaker: ASH
dialogues.text: (horrified) "I buried this… I don’t remember this."
